```function modify_blobs!(xs::Vector{MyStruct})
    @inbounds @simd for i in 1:length(xs)
        b = Blobs.Blob{MyStruct}(convert(Ptr{Nothing}, pointer(xs, i)), 0, sizeof(MyStruct))
        b.a[] += 2
    end
    return xs
end```
Blobs code works nicely - basically identical to the unsafe version (because that's what it does) and generates almost identical vectorised code

```function modify_unsafe_nice!(xs::Vector{MyStruct})

    @inbounds @simd ivdep for i in 1:length(xs)
        field_offset = fieldoffsetsym(eltype(xs), Val(:a))
        x_p = xs_p + sizeof(MyStruct) * i

        xa = unsafe_load(x_p + field_offset)
        unsafe_store!(x_p + field_offset, xa + 2)

end```
